endpoints.name: Content_FetchContent
endpoints.description: Get names and ids for game content such as agents, maps, guns, etc.

endpoints.name: AccountXP_GetPlayer
endpoints.description: Get the account level, XP, and XP history for the given player

endpoints.name: playerLoadoutUpdate
endpoints.description: Get the player's current loadout

endpoints.name: playerLoadoutUpdate
endpoints.description:
Set the player's loadout  
Use the values from [GET playerLoadoutUpdate]({{#linkto}}GET playerLoadoutUpdate{{/linkto}}) excluding properties like `subject` and `version`. Loadout changes take effect when starting a new game.

endpoints.name: MMR_FetchPlayer
endpoints.description: Get the match making rating for a player

endpoints.name: MatchHistory_FetchMatchHistory
endpoints.description:
Get recent matches for a player  
There are 3 optional query parameters: `startIndex`, `endIndex`, and `queue`. `queue` can be one of `null`, `competitive`, `custom`, `deathmatch`, `ggteam`, `newmap`, `onefa`, `snowball`, `spikerush`, or `unrated`.

endpoints.name: MatchDetails_FetchMatchDetails
endpoints.description:
Get the full info for a previous match  
Includes everything that the in-game match details screen shows including damage and kill positions.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {match id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of a previous match. Can be obtained from [MatchHistory_FetchMatchHistory]({{#linkto}}MatchHistory_FetchMatchHistory{{/linkto}})

endpoints.name: MMR_FetchCompetitiveUpdates
endpoints.description:
Get recent games and how they changed ranking  
There are 3 optional query parameters: `startIndex`, `endIndex`, and `queue`. `queue` can be one of `null`, `competitive`, `custom`, `deathmatch`, `ggteam`, `newmap`, `onefa`, `snowball`, `spikerush`, or `unrated`.

endpoints.name: MMR_FetchLeaderboard
endpoints.description:
Get the competitive leaderboard for a given season  
The query parameter `query` can be added to search for a username.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {season id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID for the season. Can be found using the `Seasons` property from the [Content_FetchContent]({{#linkto}}Content_FetchContent{{/linkto}}) endpoint.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {start index}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The index to start the leaderboard from. Typically `0`

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {size}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The number of results to get from the leaderboard. Typically `510`

endpoints.name: Restrictions_FetchPlayerRestrictionsV2
endpoints.description: Checks for any gameplay penalties on the account

endpoints.name: ItemProgressionDefinitionsV2_Fetch
endpoints.description: Get details for item upgrades

endpoints.name: Config_FetchConfig
endpoints.description: Get various internal game configuration settings set by Riot

endpoints.name: Store_GetOffers
endpoints.description: Get prices for all store items

endpoints.name: Store_GetStorefrontV2
endpoints.description: Get the currently available items in the store

endpoints.name: Store_GetWallet
endpoints.description:
Get amount of Valorant points and Radianite the player has  
Valorant points have the id `85ad13f7-3d1b-5128-9eb2-7cd8ee0b5741` and Radianite points have the id `e59aa87c-4cbf-517a-5983-6e81511be9b7`

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {order id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of the order. Can be obtained when creating an order.

endpoints.name: Store_GetEntitlements
endpoints.description:
List what the player owns (agents, skins, buddies, ect.)  
Correlate with the UUIDs in [Content_FetchContent]({{#linkto}}Content_FetchContent{{/linkto}}) to know what items are owned.   
Category names and IDs:  

`ItemTypeID` | Name
--- | ---
`01bb38e1-da47-4e6a-9b3d-945fe4655707` | Agents
`f85cb6f7-33e5-4dc8-b609-ec7212301948` | Contracts
`d5f120f8-ff8c-4aac-92ea-f2b5acbe9475` | Sprays
`dd3bf334-87f3-40bd-b043-682a57a8dc3a` | Gun Buddies
`3f296c07-64c3-494c-923b-fe692a4fa1bd` | Cards
`e7c63390-eda7-46e0-bb7a-a6abdacd2433` | Skins
`3ad1b2b2-acdb-4524-852f-954a76ddae0a` | Skin Variants
`de7caa6b-adf7-4588-bbd1-143831e786c6` | Titles

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {ItemTypeID}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: Optional url path to only return entitlements belonging to this type ID. If omitted, this endpoint will return entitlements of all types.

endpoints.name: Party_FetchPlayer
endpoints.description: Get the Party ID that a given player belongs to

endpoints.name: Party_RemovePlayer
endpoints.description: Removes a player from the current party

endpoints.name: Party_FetchParty
endpoints.description: Get details about a given party id

endpoints.name: Party_SetMemberReady
endpoints.description: Sets whether a party member is ready for queueing or not

endpoints.name: Party_RefreshCompetitiveTier
endpoints.description: Refreshes the competitive tier for a player

endpoints.name: Party_RefreshPlayerIdentity
endpoints.description: Refreshes the identity for a player

endpoints.name: Party_RefreshPings
endpoints.description: Refreshes the pings for a player

endpoints.name: Party_ChangeQueue
endpoints.description: Sets the matchmaking queue for the party

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {queue id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of the queue. Possible values can be found from the [Party_FetchParty]({{#linkto}}Party_FetchParty{{/linkto}}) endpoint under the property `EligibleQueues`.

endpoints.name: Party_StartCustomGame
endpoints.description: Starts a custom game

endpoints.name: Party_EnterMatchmakingQueue
endpoints.description: Enters the matchmaking queue

endpoints.name: Party_LeaveMatchmakingQueue
endpoints.description: Leaves the matchmaking queue

endpoints.name: Party_SetAccessibility
endpoints.description: Changes the party accessibility to be open or closed

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {accessibility}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: Can be either `OPEN` or `CLOSED`.

endpoints.name: Party_SetCustomGameSettings
endpoints.description: Changes the settings for a custom game

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {map}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: Appears to be of the format `/Game/Maps/{map name}/{map name}` where `{map name}` is the asset name for the map. You can use the [Content_FetchContent]({{#linkto}}Content_FetchContent{{/linkto}}) endpoint to get map asset names.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {mode}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The asset path for the gamemode in the format `/Game/GameModes/{id}/{name}.{name}_C`. For example, in unrated, the `{id}` is `Bomb` and the `{name}` is `BombGameMode`. It's easiest to experiment with this value by changing the mode in Valorant and using the [Party_FetchParty]({{#linkto}}Party_FetchParty{{/linkto}}) endpoint to see the resulting value.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {pod}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of the pod to use for the server. You can view pods and associated pings for each party member with the [Party_FetchParty]({{#linkto}}Party_FetchParty{{/linkto}}) endpoint.

endpoints.name: Party_InviteToPartyByDisplayName
endpoints.description: Invites a player to the party with their display name

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {name}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The username of the player

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {tag}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The tag of the player

endpoints.name: Party_RequestToJoinParty
endpoints.description: Requests to join a party

endpoints.name: Party_DeclineRequest
endpoints.description: Declines a party request

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {request id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of the party request. Can be found from the `Requests` array on the [Party_FetchParty]({{#linkto}}Party_FetchParty{{/linkto}}) endpoint.

endpoints.name: Party_FetchCustomGameConfigs
endpoints.description: Get information about the available gamemodes

endpoints.name: Party_FetchMUCToken
endpoints.description: Get a token for party chat

endpoints.name: Party_FetchVoiceToken
endpoints.description: Get a token for party voice

endpoints.name: CoreGame_FetchPlayer
endpoints.description: Get the game ID for an ongoing game the player is in

endpoints.name: CoreGame_FetchMatch
endpoints.description: Get information about an ongoing game

endpoints.name: CoreGame_FetchMatchLoadouts
endpoints.description: Get player skins and sprays for an ongoing game

endpoints.name: CoreGame_FetchTeamChatMUCToken
endpoints.description: Get a token for team chat

endpoints.name: CoreGame_FetchAllChatMUCToken
endpoints.description: Get a token for all chat

endpoints.name: CoreGame_DisassociatePlayer
endpoints.description: Leave an in-progress game

endpoints.name: Pregame_GetPlayer
endpoints.description: Get the ID of a game in the pre-game stage

endpoints.name: Pregame_GetMatch
endpoints.description: Get info for a game in the pre-game stage

endpoints.name: Pregame_GetMatchLoadouts
endpoints.description: Get player skins and sprays for a game in the pre-game stage

endpoints.name: Pregame_FetchChatToken
endpoints.description: Get a chat token

endpoints.name: Pregame_FetchVoiceToken
endpoints.description: Get a voice token

endpoints.name: Pregame_SelectCharacter
endpoints.description:
Select an agent  
**DO NOT USE THIS FOR INSTALOCKING**  
Riot doesn't like this. You may get banned or get the API restricted for the rest of us.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {agent id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of the agent. You can get this ID from the [Content_FetchContent]({{#linkto}}Content_FetchContent{{/linkto}}) endpoint.

endpoints.name: Pregame_LockCharacter
endpoints.description:
Lock in an agent  
**DO NOT USE THIS FOR INSTALOCKING**  
Riot doesn't like this. You may get banned or get the API restricted for the rest of us.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {agent id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of the agent. You can get this ID from the [Content_FetchContent]({{#linkto}}Content_FetchContent{{/linkto}}) endpoint.

endpoints.name: Pregame_QuitMatch
endpoints.description: Quit a match in the pre-game stage

endpoints.name: ContractDefinitions_Fetch
endpoints.description: Get names and descriptions for contracts

endpoints.name: Contracts_Fetch
endpoints.description: Get a list of contracts and completion status including match history

endpoints.name: Contracts_Activate
endpoints.description: Activate a particular contract

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {contract id}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The ID of the contract to activate. Can be found from the [ContractDefinitions_Fetch]({{#linkto}}ContractDefinitions_Fetch{{/linkto}}) endpoint.

endpoints.name: ContractDefinitions_FetchActiveStory
endpoints.description: Get the battlepass contracts

endpoints.name: ItemProgressionDefinitionsV2_Fetch
endpoints.description: Get item upgrades

endpoints.name: Local Help
endpoints.description: Get local endpoint names and websocket events

endpoints.name: RiotClientSession_FetchSessions
endpoints.description: Gets info about the running Valorant process including start arguments

endpoints.name: RSO Auth User Info
endpoints.description: Gets info about the authenticated Riot account

endpoints.name: Riot Client Region
endpoints.description: Gets info about the region and locale from the Riot client

endpoints.name: PlayerAlias_RNet_GetActiveAlias
endpoints.description: Gets the player username and tagline

endpoints.name: RSO_RNet_GetEntitlementsToken
endpoints.description:
Gets both the token and entitlement for API usage  
`accessToken` is used as the token and `token` is used as the entitlement.

endpoints.name: TEXT_CHAT_RNet_FetchSession
endpoints.description: Get the current session including player name and PUUID

endpoints.name: CHATFRIENDS_RNet_GET_ALL
endpoints.description: Get a list of friends

endpoints.name: PRESENCE_RNet_GET_ALL
endpoints.description:
Get a list of online friends and their activity  
`private` is a base64-encoded JSON string that contains useful information such as party and in-progress game score.

endpoints.name: RiotKV_RNet_GetSettings
endpoints.description: Get client settings

endpoints.name: FRIENDS_RNet_FetchFriendRequests
endpoints.description: Get pending friend requests

endpoints.name: Party Chat Info
endpoints.description: Get information about the party chat

endpoints.name: Pregame Chat Info
endpoints.description: Get information about the pregame chat

endpoints.name: Game Chat Info
endpoints.description: Get information about the game chat

endpoints.name: All Chat Info
endpoints.description: Get information about all active conversations

endpoints.name: TEXT_CHAT_RNet_FetchParticipants
endpoints.description: Get information about the participants of a chat

endpoints.name: All Chat Participants
endpoints.description: Get information about all the participants of every active conversation

endpoints.name: Send Whisper
endpoints.description: Send a whisper to the specified player

endpoints.name: Send Chat
endpoints.description: Send a message to the specified group

endpoints.name: All Chat History
endpoints.description: Get chat history for all conversations

endpoints.name: Specific Chat History
endpoints.description: Get chat history for a specific conversation

endpoints.name: Local Swagger Docs
endpoints.description: Fetches json Swagger docs for local endpoints. Can be imported into Swagger or Insomnia.

endpoints.name: Riot Client Command-Line Args
endpoints.description: Gets the command-line args provided to the Riot client

endpoints.name: Valorant Log Path
endpoints.description: Gets the Valorant log path

endpoints.name: URNetClient_GetProcessInfo
endpoints.description: Gets the Valorant process ID

endpoints.name: URNetClient_CheckPluginStatus
endpoints.description: Gets plugin status

endpoints.name: URNetClient_CheckRMSSession
endpoints.description: Gets the token for Riot Messaging Service

endpoints.name: LOCALE_RNet_FetchLocale
endpoints.description: Get the current locale

endpoints.name: LOCALE_RNet_FetchAvailableLocales
endpoints.description: Get available locales

endpoints.name: RSO_RNet_GetAccessToken
endpoints.description: Gets a Riot access token

endpoints.name: RSO_RNet_FetchClientAuthorizations
endpoints.description: Gets tokens in use by the client

endpoints.name: LEGAL_INFO_RNet_EULA
endpoints.description: Get the EULA

endpoints.name: TEXT_CHAT_RNet_GetMUCInfos - pregame
endpoints.description: Get pregame conversations

endpoints.name: TEXT_CHAT_RNet_GetMUCInfos - parties
endpoints.description: Get party conversations

endpoints.name: TEXT_CHAT_RNet_GetMUCInfos - coregame
endpoints.description: Get in-game conversations

endpoints.name: TEXT_CHAT_RNet_GetMUCInfos - tournaments
endpoints.description: Get in-tournament conversations

endpoints.name: LEGAL_INFO_RNet_Privacy
endpoints.description: Get privacy policy

endpoints.name: TEXT_CHAT_RNet_FetchSettings
endpoints.description: Get chat settings

endpoints.name: VOICE_CHAT_RNet_FetchCaptureDevices
endpoints.description: Get microphone input device info

endpoints.name: VOICE_CHAT_RNet_FetchAudioProperties
endpoints.description: Get audio properties such as if the microphone is in use

endpoints.name: VOICE_CHAT_RNet_FetchRenderDevices
endpoints.description: Get audio output devices

endpoints.name: RiotStatus_RNet_FetchStatus
endpoints.description:
Get game status information such as maintenances and incidents  
Response is an escaped JSON string.

endpoints.name: Session_Get
endpoints.description: Get information about the current game session

endpoints.name: Auth Cookies
endpoints.description: Prepare cookies for auth request

endpoints.name: Auth Request
endpoints.description:
Perform authorization request to get token  
Requires cookies from the [Auth Cookies]({{#linkto}}Auth Cookies{{/linkto}}) stage. The token can be found in the `uri` property.

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {username}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The player username / email for signing in

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {password}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The player password for signing in

endpoints.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
endpoints.description: Submits a multi-factor authentication code for login

uniqueVariableDescription.name: {mfa code}
uniqueVariableDescription.value: The code received from the secondary location (email)

endpoints.name: Cookie Reauth
endpoints.description:
Get a new token using the cookies from a previous authorization request  
Use the saved cookies from [Auth Request]({{#linkto}}Auth Request{{/linkto}}). The token can be found from the url this request redirects to.  
Recommended to use this endpoint instead of storing the password and sending it again.

endpoints.name: Entitlement
endpoints.description: Get entitlement for remote requests with a token

endpoints.name: RSO_GetPlayerInfo
endpoints.description: Get the PUUID from a token
